alert.note: Alert for Yukon-Koyukuk (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 8:29PM AKDT until July 05 at 9:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Yukon-Koyukuk in Alaska... * Until 900 PM AKDT. * At 828 PM AKDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 63 miles east of Seven Mile, or 64 miles northwest of Twelvemile Summit, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles and property is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Yukon-Koyukuk. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
